snippet: CURCIO--Columba (Curio), on January 11th at age 100. Retired NYC School Teacher. Survived by her sister Marie Buonomo, brother Noah Curcio, nine nieces and nephews and many great and great-great nieces and nephews. Reposing Farenga Bros., 920 Allerton Ave., Bronx, on Friday, January 15th, 2-5 and 7-9pm. Funeral Mass Saturday, January 16th, 10am at Holy Cross Church. Entombment St. Raymond's Cemetery. 1/3
